name: textSelections(interactingAt:inContainerAt:anchors:modifiers:selecting:bounds:)
desc: Returns an array of text selections produced by a tap or click at the point you specify.
declaration:
func textSelections(interactingAt point: CGPoint, 
      inContainerAt containerLocation: NSTextLocation, 
            anchors: [NSTextSelection], 
          modifiers: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Modifier, 
          selecting: Bool, 
             bounds: CGRect) -> [NSTextSelection]
